The three columns (C1 - C3) represent the past, present, and future, respectively. In each row, cards are interpreted as follows: Row 1: Cause, dynamic, impulse, guiding idea, or motive being a situation or event. Row 2: Effect of first card at the emotional, social, or relationship level. Row 3: Effect of first card at the physical level of manifestation.
